ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: That Day some faces will be dust-covered,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Some faces on that Day shall be dust-ridden,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And many a face will be covered with dust on that day.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And other faces that Day will be dust-stained.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And (many) faces on that day, on them shall be dust,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: some faces on that day shall be dusty
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And other faces, on that day, with dust upon them,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: but some faces will be covered with dust
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And faces on that Day! upon them shall be gloom.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: and some faces on that day will be covered with dust,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And other faces that Day will be dust-stained,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And other faces, that Day, will be dust-stained;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: whereas some faces will be covered with dust
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And Faces on that Day will be covered with misery.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And [other] faces, that Day, will have upon them dust.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [80:40] And some faces on that day will be covered with dust,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And other faces) the faces of the hypocrites and disbelievers, (on that day) on the Day of Judgement, (with dust upon them,
